Text: District cooling regulationfrom Bob Julian Consultant to the Padres and Burnham Forwarded by Michael O YambrachHOUEES on AM Bob Julian on PM To Michael O ES cc Jim Chatfield Subject District cooling regulation Mike Regarding your question about regulatory oversight of chilled water services by the CPUC in San Diego my information indicates that the CPUC does not regulate the existing chilled water services in San Diego Also to confirm our conversation San Diego Power Cooling is operating under what we understand is a nonexclusive franchise agreement with the City of San Diego Ill have an answer for you shortly on the common facilities question you posed Bob Julian Power Procurement Group atthtm
